info.author: Christian Scholz
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Introduction
============

The pydataportability.model.resource package defines models for resources.

The model entities are modelled after an XRD document, where a resource
contains certain information and a list of links to other resources which have
certain properties themselves.

Check out the documentation at http://pydataportability.net for more information.


Contributors
============

Christian Scholz, COM.lounge GmbH, cs@comlounge.net, http://mrtopf.de/blog

info.name: pydataportability.model.resource
info.summary: Model classes and interfaces for resource descriptions for pydataportability and e.g. XRD parsers
